text: Enrique Castellón Vargas (April 7, 1928 – April 22, 2020), better known as El Príncipe Gitano (the gipsy prince) was a Spanish flamenco singer, actor and dancer. He was born in Valencia, Spain. He was a bullfighter briefly.Muere El Príncipe Gitano, un artista que soñó con ser torero in Aplausos (in Spanish) His most famous song is "Obí, obá". He also created a Spanish version of Elvis' song "In the Ghetto".Muere con coronavirus el actor y cantante Enrique Castellón Vargas, 'El Príncipe Gitano' in eldiario.es (in Spanish) His best known movies were Brindis al cielo (1954), Un heredero en apuros (1956), Veraneo en España (1956), El alma de la copla (1965), El milagro del cante (1967) and Españolear (1969). Gitano died of COVID-19 on April 22, 2020 in Madrid, aged 88.Fallece por coronavirus a los 88 años el 'Príncipe gitano' ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Madrid Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish dancers
title: El Príncipe Gitano
